member.name: P:BatteryCommander.Web.Models.Soldier.ClsQualified
member.summary: While a CLS certification is technically permanent, soldiers in Priority 1 units (actively-deploying brigade combat teams, for example) must retake the course once a year to retain their certification.

member.name: P:BatteryCommander.Web.Models.Soldier.EducationLevel
member.summary: The highest level of military education attained by the Soldier

member.name: P:BatteryCommander.Web.Models.Soldier.CanLogin
member.summary: If true, the user has been granted access to log in to the application

member.name: F:BatteryCommander.Web.Models.ABCP.MAX_DIFFERNCE
member.summary: Measurements are considered invalid if they're greater than 1 inch apart

member.name: P:BatteryCommander.Web.Models.ABCP.Height
member.summary: Recorded to nearest half inch when used for body fat percentage calculations

member.name: P:BatteryCommander.Web.Models.ABCP.Weight
member.summary: Recorded to the nearest pound for all usage

member.name: P:BatteryCommander.Web.Models.ABCP.IsSatisfactory
member.summary: Returns true if the Soldier made satisfactory progress since the last ABCP weigh-in

member.name: T:BatteryCommander.Web.Models.ACFT
member.summary: Army Combat Fitness Test, replaces the APFT

member.name: P:BatteryCommander.Web.Models.Evaluation.DelinquentAfter
member.summary: After this period of time, incomplete evaluations are considered delinquent

member.name: P:BatteryCommander.Web.Models.Evaluation.Completed
member.summary: List of statuses that represent completed evaluations

member.name: F:BatteryCommander.Web.Models.EventStatus.NotTested
member.summary: Soldier either does not have a record for this event, or the time validity of the event has passed

member.name: F:BatteryCommander.Web.Models.EventStatus.Passed
member.summary: Soldier has a passing record for this event within a valid period of time

member.name: F:BatteryCommander.Web.Models.EventStatus.Failed
member.summary: Soldier's most recent record for this event was a failure

member.name: T:BatteryCommander.Web.Models.Gender
member.summary:
This of course does not take into account gender non-binary soldiers.
For administative purposes (i.e. scoring an APFT) we require a gender.

member.name: M:BatteryCommander.Web.Models.RankExtensions.All
member.summary: Returns an ordered list of ranks for display

member.name: M:BatteryCommander.Web.Services.UserService.FindAsync(BatteryCommander.Web.Models.Database,System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal)
member.summary: Find the Soldier associated with the given user. Will throw an exception if more than Soldier is found. Will return null if none was found.
